battle_start: Ahahahaha! You’re either fearless or foolish! Let’s analyze your pain! ♪
Meddling again? Resign yourself to incineration! ♪
battle_won: Your Pokémon weep for such a pitiful trainer!
done_looser: Ahaha… Unanticipated variables… But Magma’s vision burns eternal!
Your persistence… amuses. But the land will still rise!
